Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Limits the amount of time to submit supporting documentation for major capital improvements
Summary: Limits the amount of time to submit supporting documentation for major capital improvements; sets such time at one hundred and twenty days.
LawCode: Amd §§26-405 & 26-511, NYC Ad Cd; amd §4, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd §4, Emerg Hous Rent Cont L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four and the emergency housing rent control law, in relation to the amount of time to submit supporting documentation for major capital improvements
